{{Location Intro|{{Lang|'''Mt. Hulao'''|zh=琥牢山|zh_rm=Hǔláo-shān|zh_tl=Amber-Prison Mountain}}|description=<p>The large pieces of [[Amber Rock]] found along the mountain are formed by flowers [[Mountain Shaper]] planted to keep out intruders. These plants, called karst crawlers, are mostly hidden underground and will produce Amber Rock to trap anything that steps on it.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Moulder of Mountains}}</ref> Breaking the amber will reveal what was trapped inside &mdash; either treasure or enemies.</p>}}

===Interactables===
*Mysterious Barrier
**In front of the pond, there is a sealed cave. Interacting with the seal shows this dialogue:
{{Dialogue Start}}
::'''Mysterious Barrier:''' (Jueyun Karst is where the adepti dwell, so perhaps this is the abode of one. But there seems to be no way to enter...)
{{Dialogue End}}
*Visit the adeptus' abode
**After completing [[Archon Quests|Archon Quest]] [[Chapter I]], Act I: [[Of the Land Amidst Monoliths]], the dialogue changes to:
{{Dialogue Start}}
::'''Visit the adeptus' abode:''' (The abode of Mountain Shaper. This adeptus is presently absent.)
{{Dialogue End}}
